title: How Can Physics-Informed Machine Learning Redefine AI Applications?
description: In a momentous stride forward, the integration of artificial intelligence and physics, known as “physics-informed machine learning,” is reshaping the landscape of AI capabilities. While linguistic prowess in models like ChatGPT has seized the spotlight, the essentiality for AI to delve into the realms of physics has become paramount in addressing intricate challenges across robotics, ...
